meanings.definition: Resembling a belly in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The round, bellylike cloud floated lazily in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The balloon had a bellylike curve at the bottom.
meanings.sent3: The bellylike pumpkin made the scarecrow look like it had eaten too much.
meanings.sent4: The hills rolled out in a bellylike pattern across the landscape.
meanings.sent5: Her bellylike laughter filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: Having a similar size or shape to a belly.
meanings.sent1: The bellylike pillow was soft and comforting.
meanings.sent2: The bellylike drum had a wide, round shape.
meanings.sent3: The bellylike watermelon was almost too heavy to carry.
meanings.sent4: The bellylike curve of the road led us through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The bellylike boat bobbed gently on the water.
